nodes.text: Sanctuary Squadron was a starfighter squadron of the New Republic. Shortly after the Battle of Endor, when Operation: Cinder began, High Command formed a new group dedicated to the protection of worlds under the Galactic Empire's heel.
Sanctuary Squadron's starfighters were painted green with light gray markings/stripes.
Sanctuary Squadron was one of the multiplayer starfighter cosmetic options in the 2020 game Star Wars: Squadrons.
